item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G131B07 - G131B26
item.description:
Sep 13, 12:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/09/2022 11:29 UTC
End Time : 13/09/2022 12:25 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the affected racks are reachable.
Root cause : Electrical issue was the cause of this incident.

Sep 13, 11:48 UTC
Identified - Start time : 13/09/2022 11:29 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the racks G131B26 are operational again, our teams continue to work on the servers in the rack G131B07.
Root cause : An electrical issue was at the origin of this incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams working on the remain servers.

Sep 13, 11:45 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/09/2022 11:29 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the racks G131B07 - G131B26 are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the source of this issue for a fix.
